DOC.brief_summary: The World Health Organisation warn influenza pandemic inevitable . The avian influenza H5N1 virus strain lead candidate cause next influenza pandemic . This study test safety immunogenicity H5N1 Pandemic Influenza Vaccine healthy adult . The Study also assess Lot Lot consistency Pandemic Influenza Vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Pandemic Influenza Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adults Previous vaccination influenza Vaccine contain H5N1 strain History clinically significant medical condition History GuillianBarre Syndrome active Neurological disease
